title: Falafel Bistro and Wine Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Catering, Middle Eastern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Fine dining atmosphere with menu that offers many vegetarian dishes and vegan items alongside non-veg dishes. Extensive range of vegetarian wraps, salads, appetizers and tapas, sandwiches, flaky crepes, and main plates. Try the lentil soup or the veggie wrap. Take Sawgrass Expressway exit 14.
